definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: There are few people who may be described as geniuses.
sentences.chinese: 很少有能稱得上天才的人。

sentences.english: But software can be said to serve its users only if it respects their freedom.
sentences.chinese: 但軟件只有尊重了用戶的自由才能稱得上是服務用戶。

sentences.english: Malbec really is one of the relatively unknown gems of the Chilean climate.
sentences.chinese: 馬貝克稱得上是智利無名的寶石。

sentences.english: Which lager can claim to be truly German? This can.
sentences.chinese: 哪種大罐啤酒可稱得上是地道的德國貨？這罐。

sentences.english: Civil disobedience isn't moral because it's non-violent.
sentences.chinese: 消極抵抗並非因爲其非暴力的特點而稱得上道德。

sentences.english: Keira's next bit of TV work was in this one-off drama.
sentences.chinese: 凱拉下一部稱得上是電視工作的是一個一次性的戲劇。

sentences.english: Only with this can be called the seven characteristics of authentic Mapo tofu.
sentences.chinese: 只有具備了這七大特點才能稱得上是正宗的麻婆豆腐。

sentences.english: The gold farmland is one Sir, the song red lady calls is an up the then gifted woman.
sentences.chinese: 金田一先生，歌紅女士稱得上是當時的才女。

sentences.english: He belongs to the two categories of players I consider worthy of the name great.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲稱得上偉大的那兩種球員，他都屬於。

sentences.english: The wet vertical abrasion mill will now be described with reference to the drawing.
sentences.chinese: 溼法立式磨磨現在稱得上參考繪畫。

sentences.english: Its one of the best works of philosophy probably ever written.
sentences.chinese: 那些偉大的哲學作品稱得上是前無古人。

sentences.english: For only if the protocells can evolve might they merit status as living cells.
sentences.chinese: 原細胞只有進化了，才稱得上是活細胞。

sentences.english: In terms of instant break-out force it also can be called the best piano in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在瞬發力方面，亦可稱得上是世界上最好的鋼琴。

sentences.english: The park can be regarded as strong school partnership together.
sentences.chinese: 這次園校合作可稱得上是強強聯手。

sentences.english: (S/NF) What followed can only be described as a masterpiece of modern diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 接下來發生的事可以稱得上是現代外交史上的傑作。

sentences.english: In the field of fictions, Su Tong is one of the key figures.
sentences.chinese: 在小說領域，蘇童可稱得上是先鋒派的核心作家之一。
